p: In total, 57 ECM taxa were detected ( Supplementary Table 2): 51 taxa were assigned at the species level, two at the genus level, and four at the order level. There were no significant differences in the number of ECM fungal species per tree between the NEX and EXT treatments ( p > 0.05, Table 1). However, differences among tree species were detected; silver birch had significantly higher number of ECM fungal species per tree than Norway spruce and European larch ( p < 0.005), and Norway spruce and European larch did not differ significantly ( p > 0.05, Table 1).
